column1: 9/13A, SH 49, near Green Town Restaurant, Kunnikadu, Chennai, Thiruvidanthai, Tamil Nadu 603112
name: abhilasha kumari
Vivek Manoharan
review: The AC was not working, infact the inverter was smoking up due to a malfunction, the filter coffee was very bad.

name: Luk Gastmans
review: This Cafe Coffee Day gets all the stars because of the staff. The lady and the gentleman are friendly, polite, and keep this CCD a favourite destiny for our family because of their service. ‚Ä¶

name: Manuel Prem Raj A
review: Not worthy for the money

name: Kalai Arasan
review: Ac not working and the atmosphere is not that great

name: Cherry Chacko
review: Nice atmosphere and food and coffee. Only minus is the place is massively understaffed.

name: aarshi raina
review: Worst food and coffee quality

name: gayathri Influencer
review: Service people didn't answer the question properly I totally disappointed the mind

name: adinani Jaswanth
review:
Visited on 17-12-2023,AC NOT WORKING

FOOD AND SERVICE IS BETTER
STAFF IS FRIENDLY

name: Sudhar san
review: Ambiance is good

name: Srikant Barua
review: A nice place to have a coffee after some long ride in ECR.

name: bharathi vikkiraman
review: Very nice

name: Anish
review: I don‚Äôt want to give even one star for this outlet, because the atmosphere was too bad and no AC it was so suffocating to have our drink. And flies were flying all over our food.

name: KEERTHIRAJAN K
review: Clean and good.

name: Bijan kumar
review:
Good place to hang out. Preperation needs to be checked as taste are slightly deviate from typical CCD taste. Location wise awesome.
They must focussed on cleanliness. When we went no one there but tables we were not cleaned and used plates were kept here and there . We have asked them to clean. Rest is fine

name: Abhishek Nag
review: Decent food but need to maintain the place better.Cleanliness was not upto the mark.

name: Sankar Umesh
review: Good

name: Siva
review: Coffee is good but they won't give receipt, different reason every time for not giving receipt. Feel for the owner.

name: Logapurushothaman T
review: No air conditioner

name: Harika Mallemala
review: Eventhough the service and food are good ,the atmosphere was very uncomfortable,as the airconditioner not working and it's damn hot weather.Even fans are not kept.We went to dine in ,but finally we chose to take away and had our food in the car.

name: Prem Anand Udhayasuriyan
review: As usual a great coffee experience at Coffee day. We were returning from Mahabalipuram and this place on the left right on the highway. ‚Ä¶

name: Manisha V
review: Love this place! Been around for almost 8 years I think! Nice place to have a relaxing time with family !!

name: Naina Singhi
review: The cafe coffee day brand is my favourite but the staff adds disgrace to the brand. He was rude right from the beginning from taking the order.

name: Sachin Sarate
review: Nice experience!

name: R01 Tripathi
review: Average

name: Zita
review: Good and pleasant ambience

name: Tamil Arasan
review:
The price is too high.

I don't know at what basis they made costing the products.

name: Aleem Shareif
review: Worst maintenance...

name: John Paul
review: Worst service experienced,  though giving huge money.

name: Ramanathan Rm
review: Hazelnut hot chocolate was good

name: shyam sundhar
review: Very free. No people most of the time. Ideal for dates. Great window view and ambience

name: Karthick Shiva
review: Nice ambience on the ECR. Try Croissant with sausage.

name: Mohamed Vagith
review: This place is asusual good for long time chats and business talks, price is same as all time, normal clean interior, clean bathroom, can sit here and have a relaxed coffee. You will spend minimum 200 per head

name: Meenal Ramesh
review: Ambience was nice but the whole service was poor. They kept on pestering us to order something every other hour we were there doing work.

name: Selva Kumar
review: Coffe is not worth the price.

name: Lokkesh s
review: one of the worst cafe day outlet i ever visited no ac in here , even i have asked they are mentioning ac is not working sorry , but rates are very expensive and also very stinky smell all over the place

name: sherin safreen
review: Cold coffee was too bitter, very bad maintenance, couch chairs were dirty

name: Aravinthakrishnan K
review: Too much expensive, Not worth it!

name: kuttimani k
review: All is good, but "Mosquitoes"?? (Hence three stars)

name: Kavita Jayram
review: Congratulations to Malavika Hegde..... Her relentlessly hard work is seen in all Her Coffee Days.  More food is available and coffee and tea options r better than ever before üíú ‚Ä¶

name: Goutham Murali
review: Friday and Saturday it will be open 24hrs other days nice service peaceful

name: Gowtham Ashokan
review: Stinking smell was observed and we didn't order anything further and left the place.  We just bought a bottle of water and were chatting for some time.

name: Believer Dinu
review: You can hang out throughout the night...   No time limit

name: MAHESH KUMAR.S
review: Nice

name: shailendra theboss
review: Best place to hangout..!

name: Ambaprasad G
review: Very badly maintained to say the least ...

name: Papiya Pal
review: Good as always

name: Epshita Ganguly
review:
Ac wasn't working and it felt like suffocating.
The cappuccino was good. Bt thr wasn't anything to eat of choice it wasn't good experience to stop with family.

name: Deepak Pillai
review: Why should I pay 150 bucks ($2+) for mediocre, pretentious coffee when i can get good filter coffee for a fraction!

name: na vaduganathan
review: Good caffee

name: Time Timer
review: I bought a cake here lastnight it was awful and it is not fresh they frozen the cake number of weeks and preheating and giving to us also the cafe full of mosquitos not maintained ü•¥ properly cafe day nowadays become like roadside coffeeshop ‚Ä¶

name: Tamilarasan M
review: I don't know ccd has this outlet, it's ready to be shut down. In dilapidated condition. Whatever you ask, the only answer you get is "no stock". You might get coffee though.

name: Manoj Srinivasan
review: Vanilla latte

name: Arun Thulasidharan
review: Nice to see the ecr coffee cafe day open all Night. No AC though!

name: Rajiv Krishna
review: Ok so everything apart from coffee products seems like they serve frozen food which was reheated. Price is of course exorbitant for the quantity and quality.

name: Arun Jawarlal
review: We always love Cafe Coffee day, but this particular location had the AC broken and the employees drenched in sweat. But the food quality was consistent which saved the day.

name: aravind kamaraj Rajendran
review: Very bad AC was not working

name: sundar shrinivas
review: Good for a night out coffee!

name: Deepak Behera
review: Nice place on the ECR to have some Cold Coffee and Snacks.

name: Sofia Arulraj
review: Loved the place

name: divya ravikumar rudrapati
review: Awesome! Real CCD experience after a very long time. Very good service by Mr. Uthravel. üòÑüòÑ ‚Ä¶

name: PRADEEP YEKOLLU
review: No need to go to this place .

name: Alagasan G
review: Just like any other CCD it is good as w√©ll, one added advantage will be it open during late night tooüëçüèº ‚Ä¶

name: Monika Rathore
review: Good ambience,with good coustomer service

name: Srinath Mohan
review: Visited cafe coffee day , ECR konnikadu, Chennai outlet in the evening along with my spouse. ‚Ä¶

name: Andrew Fuller
review:
Excellent staff.
Very courteous

name: Preethisha Preethisha
review: Happy üíô ‚Ä¶

name: shafiul huq huq
review: Tasty

name: Pratheeba Muruganandham
review: Nice place to hang out

name: Shanmugaraj Manivasagam
review: Ambient neat and Cozy..

name: Charles Rodrigues
review: Nice place for quick coffee but poor eating choices. Easily can be located from the main road ECR. It has parking space. There is no transparency in payment option. No scanning available you have up ask them then they will give Google pay number.

name: Shwetank Jindal
review: Good coffee

name: Sheriff Allah Pichai
review: Stopped over for evening coffee on our drive back to Chennai and enjoyed the beverages.recommend the frappe anyday!

name: Manickavelu Masilamani
review: Cool & relax tea time
